import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Form, FormControl, InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSearchContent } from '../hooks/useSqlContent'; import { useGSAPAnimations } from '../hooks/useGSAPAnimations'; const Home = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const { search, results, loading } = useSearchContent(); const pageRef = useRef(null); const cardRefs = useRef([]); const headerRef = useRef(null); const { animatePage, animateCards, animateHeaders } = useGSAPAnimations(); animatePage(pageRef); animateCards(cardRefs); animateHeaders(headerRef); const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (searchQuery.trim()) { search(searchQuery); } }; return (

setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} />

)} Welcome to SQL Learning Center This website provides comprehensive tutorials and examples for SQL databases including MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, and PostgreSQL. Whether you're a beginner learning SQL basics or an advanced user looking for complex query examples, you'll find everything you need here. MySQL The world's most popular open-source database Microsoft SQL Server Enterprise-grade database solution by Microsoft PostgreSQL The most advanced open-source database SQL Basics Start with fundamental SQL concepts and commands that apply to all database systems. Advanced SQL Explore complex queries, stored procedures, and advanced database concepts. What You'll Learn
  • SELECT statements
  • JOIN operations
  • Data manipulation
  • Database design
  • Performance optimization
  • Stored procedures
  • Triggers and functions
  • Security best practices
  • Advanced analytics
); }; export default Home;
